name: Send OTP
description: Send a One-Time Password (OTP) to the specified email address via Gmail SMTP

body.name: email
body.description: The email address to send OTP to

response.description: Returns success message with email and expiry time

example.message: OTP sent successfully to your email

notes: OTP is 6 digits and valid for 10 minutes
Each request generates a new OTP and deletes the previous one
OTP is sent via Gmail SMTP server
